mapper.select: SELECT TO_DATE(ordr_date, 'rrrr-MM-dd') ordr_date, ordr_id, me_id, rcv_psn, rcv_phone, rcv_addr, tt_prc, mthd, invo, ship_prc, get_common(prc_st) prc_st, get_common(ship_st) ship_st, point, note FROM order_header WHERE me_id = #{meId}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM order_detail od JOIN order_header oh ON od.ordr_id = oh.ordr_id WHERE me_id = #{meId}

SELECT TO_DATE(ordr_date, 'rrrr-MM-dd') ordr_date, ordr_id, me_id, rcv_psn, rcv_phone, rcv_addr, tt_prc, mthd, invo, ship_prc, get_common(prc_st) prc_st, get_common(ship_st) ship_st, point, note FROM order_header WHERE ordr_id = #{ordrId}

SELECT TO_DATE(ordr_date, 'rrrr-MM-dd') ordr_date, ordr.ordr_id, prdt_img, prdt_nm, invo, get_common(ship_st) ship_st, get_common(prc_st) prc_st, ordt.prdt_id, ship_prc, cnt, NVL(cnt, 0) * NVL(prc, 0) "PRICE", ordt.ordt_id, prc FROM order_header ordr JOIN order_detail ordt ON ordr.ordr_id = ordt.ordr_id JOIN product pr ON ordt.prdt_id = pr.prdt_id JOIN product_img img ON pr.prdt_id = img.prdt_id WHERE 1=1 AND ordr.ordr_id = #{ordrId} AND is_main = 'Y'
SELECT COUNT(prc_st) prc_count, get_common(prc_st) prc_st FROM order_header WHERE me_id = #{meId} GROUP BY get_common(prc_st)
SELECT NVL(COUNT(*),0) ship_count, get_common(ship_st) ship_st FROM order_header WHERE me_id = #{meId} GROUP BY get_common(ship_st)

SELECT DISTINCT odo.ordt_id, LISTAGG(pod.opt_deta_nm, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY opt_deta_nm) OVER(PARTITION BY odo.ordt_id) opt_deta_nm FROM ORDER_DETAIL_OPTION odo JOIN PRODUCT_OPTION_DETAIL pod ON odo.OPT_DETA_ID = pod.OPT_DETA_ID WHERE ORDT_ID = #{ordtId}

SELECT ip.prdt_id, int_in_dt, prdt_nm, prdt_img, prdt_prc FROM interest_product ip JOIN product pr ON ip.prdt_id = pr.prdt_id JOIN PRODUCT_IMG img ON ip.prdt_id = img.prdt_id WHERE 1=1 AND is_main = 'Y' AND me_id = #{meId}
